channel.title: DevOps on Kamil Rithaler
channel.description: Recent content in DevOps on Kamil Rithaler

item.title: Automate deployment of custom Power Platform connectors
item.description: Power Platform custom connectors enable using your API in Power Apps or Power Automate flows. When the API which you plan to integrate with your app is a stable and finished product, then creating a custom connector is a one-time task to do. However, when the API is a part of a developed solution or is under active development then keeping the connector in sync with the API is a cumbersome task.
